::Battera::

She flew  and finally starts to get close to the Allience base.  As 
she got closer, she heard the sounds of battle.  Lazar fire, grenades 
exploding, guns firing.  She smiled, "Ah finally, a little 
excitement."  She wouldn't get there for another half hour of flying 
time. But with her sensitive hearing, she knew that when she got 
there, she would see action.  She smiled at the thought.  Then she 
frowned at remembering what a weak, peaceful bot she had been.  She 
cussed under her breath for being such a disgusting, snivelling, 
weakling of a bot.   She felt freed of her maximal tenancies and 
found herself craving some fun on the battle field.
